Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by Boston (UBA) in 1968...
Traded from Boston (UBA) to Troy on 3/2/1968 (Going to PIL: CF B. Rodriguez. Going to TRO: C C. Davis, 1B J. Marsh)...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 8/19/1970, off Nicholas Funk (WT)...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Catcher in 1973...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1974, hitting .538 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1975, hitting .560 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 4/26/1977...
Drove in 6 runs against Coney Island on 4/14/1978...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
